examples.example: 我们打算年底结婚，共同开启幸福的新生活。

translate.english: We plan to get married at the end of the year and jointly start a happy new life.

examples.example: 他们经过多年的爱情长跑，终于幸福地结婚了。

translate.english: They finally got married happily after many years of a long love run.

examples.example: 两位相爱的年轻人决定携手走进婚姻殿堂，结婚后过上了甜蜜美满的生活。

translate.english: The two young people who love each other decide to walk hand in hand into the palace of marriage, and after getting married, they live a sweet and happy life.
